verses.verse: Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore hearken, <S%H8085><s%> O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> the judgments, <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> teach <S%H3925><s%> you, for to do <S%H6213><s%> them, that <S%H4616><s%> ye may live, <S%H2421><s%> and go in <S%H935><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> you.

Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> add <S%H3254><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> you, neither <S%H3808><s%> shall ye diminish <S%H1639><s%> aught from <S%H4480><s%> it, that ye may keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> you.

Your eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> what <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> because of Baal-peor: <S%H1187><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> followed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> Baal-peor, <S%H1187><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> you.
But ye <S%H859><s%> that did cleave <S%H1695><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> are alive <S%H2416><s%> every one <S%H3605><s%> of you this day. <S%H3117><s%>

Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have taught <S%H3925><s%> you statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments, <S%H4941><s%> even as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> me, that ye should do <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> in <S%H7130><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> go <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

Keep <S%H8104><s%> therefore and do <S%H6213><s%> them; for <S%H3588><s%> this <S%H1931><s%> is your wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and your understanding <S%H998><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations, <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Surely <S%H7535><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> is a wise <S%H2450><s%> and understanding <S%H995><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> what <S%H4310><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> is there so great, <S%H1419><s%> who <S%H834><s%> hath God <S%H430><s%> so nigh <S%H7138><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> is in all <S%H3605><s%> things that we call <S%H7121><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> him for?

And what <S%H4310><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> is there so great, <S%H1419><s%> that <S%H834><s%> hath statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%> so righteous <S%H6662><s%> as all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> law, <S%H8451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you this day? <S%H3117><s%>

Only <S%H7535><s%> take heed <S%H8104><s%> to thyself, and keep <S%H8104><s%> thy soul <S%H5315><s%> diligently, <S%H3966><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> thou forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H853><s%> the things <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen, <S%H7200><s%> and lest <S%H6435><s%> they depart <S%H5493><s%> from thy heart <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3824><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy life: <S%H2416><s%> but teach <S%H3045><s%> them thy sons, <S%H1121><s%> and thy sons' <S%H1121><s%> sons; <S%H1121><s%>

Especially the day <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou stoodest <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> in Horeb, <S%H2722><s%> when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Gather me the people together, <S%H6950><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5971><s%> and I will make them hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> my words, <S%H1697><s%> that <S%H834><s%> they may learn <S%H3925><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> me all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H834><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> shall live <S%H2416><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H127><s%> and that they may teach <S%H3925><s%> their children. <S%H1121><s%>

And ye came near <S%H7126><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the mountain; <S%H2022><s%> and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> burned <S%H1197><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the midst <S%H3820><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> with darkness, <S%H6205><s%> clouds, <S%H6051><s%> and thick darkness. <S%H6205><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the fire: <S%H784><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the words, <S%H1697><s%> but saw <S%H7200><s%> no <S%H369><s%> similitude; <S%H8544><s%> only <S%H2108><s%> ye heard a voice. <S%H6963><s%>

And he declared <S%H5046><s%> unto you <S%H853><s%> his covenant, <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he commanded <S%H6680><s%> you to perform, <S%H6213><s%> even ten <S%H6235><s%> commandments; <S%H1697><s%> and he wrote <S%H3789><s%> them upon <S%H5921><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone. <S%H68><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> me at that <S%H1931><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> to teach <S%H3925><s%> you statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments, <S%H4941><s%> that ye might do <S%H6213><s%> them in the land <S%H776><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> go over <S%H5674><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

Take ye therefore good heed <S%H8104><s%> <S%H3966><s%> unto yourselves; <S%H5315><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> ye saw <S%H7200><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> manner <S%H3605><s%> of similitude <S%H8544><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you in Horeb <S%H2722><s%> out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the fire: <S%H784><s%>

Lest <S%H6435><s%> ye corrupt <S%H7843><s%> yourselves, and make <S%H6213><s%> you a graven image, <S%H6459><s%> the similitude <S%H8544><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> figure, <S%H5566><s%> the likeness <S%H8403><s%> of male <S%H2145><s%> or <S%H176><s%> female, <S%H5347><s%>

The likeness <S%H8403><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H929><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is on the earth, <S%H776><s%> the likeness <S%H8403><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> winged <S%H3671><s%> fowl <S%H6833><s%> that <S%H834><s%> flieth <S%H5774><s%> in the air, <S%H8064><s%>

The likeness <S%H8403><s%> of any thing <S%H3605><s%> that creepeth <S%H7430><s%> on the ground, <S%H127><s%> the likeness <S%H8403><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> fish <S%H1710><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in the waters <S%H4325><s%> beneath <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%>

And lest <S%H6435><s%> thou lift up <S%H5375><s%> thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> unto heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and when thou seest <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sun, <S%H8121><s%> and the moon, <S%H3394><s%> and the stars, <S%H3556><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> shouldest be driven <S%H5080><s%> to worship <S%H7812><s%> them, and serve <S%H5647><s%> them, which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath divided <S%H2505><s%> <S%H853><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H5971><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> heaven. <S%H8064><s%>

But the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath taken <S%H3947><s%> you, and brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the iron <S%H1270><s%> furnace, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3564><s%> even out of Egypt, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> to be <S%H1961><s%> unto him a people <S%H5971><s%> of inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> as ye are this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Furthermore the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was angry <S%H599><s%> with me for your sakes, <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1697><s%> and swore <S%H7650><s%> that I should not <S%H1115><s%> go over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and that I should not <S%H1115><s%> go in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> that good <S%H2896><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee for an inheritance: <S%H5159><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H595><s%> must die <S%H4191><s%> in this <S%H2063><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> I must not <S%H369><s%> go over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan: <S%H3383><s%> but ye <S%H859><s%> shall go over, <S%H5674><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H2063><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> land. <S%H776><s%>

Take heed <S%H8104><s%> unto yourselves, lest <S%H6435><s%> ye forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H853><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he made <S%H3772><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> you, and make <S%H6213><s%> you a graven image, <S%H6459><s%> or the likeness <S%H8544><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> thing, which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath forbidden <S%H6680><s%> thee.
For <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> is a consuming <S%H398><s%> fire, <S%H784><s%> even a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God. <S%H410><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt beget <S%H3205><s%> children, <S%H1121><s%> and children's <S%H1121><s%> children, <S%H1121><s%> and ye shall have remained long <S%H3462><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> and shall corrupt <S%H7843><s%> yourselves, and make <S%H6213><s%> a graven image, <S%H6459><s%> or the likeness <S%H8544><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> thing, and shall do <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> to provoke him to anger: <S%H3707><s%>

I call <S%H5749><s%> <S%H853><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> to witness <S%H5749><s%> against you this day, <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> ye shall soon <S%H4118><s%> utterly perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H6><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> whereunto <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> go over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it; ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> prolong <S%H748><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it, but <S%H3588><s%> shall utterly be destroyed. <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8045><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall scatter <S%H6327><s%> you among the nations, <S%H5971><s%> and ye shall be left <S%H7604><s%> few <S%H4962><s%> in number <S%H4557><s%> among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall lead <S%H5090><s%> you.

And there <S%H8033><s%> ye shall serve <S%H5647><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of men's <S%H120><s%> hands, <S%H3027><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone, <S%H68><s%> which <S%H834><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> see, <S%H7200><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> hear, <S%H8085><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> eat, <S%H398><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> smell. <S%H7306><s%>

But if from thence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou shalt seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> thou shalt find <S%H4672><s%> him, if <S%H3588><s%> thou seek <S%H1875><s%> him with all <S%H3605><s%> thy heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> thy soul. <S%H5315><s%>

When thou art in tribulation, <S%H6862><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> are come <S%H4672><s%> upon thee, even in the latter <S%H319><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> if thou turn <S%H7725><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> and shalt be obedient <S%H8085><s%> unto his voice; <S%H6963><s%>

(For <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> is a merciful <S%H7349><s%> God;) <S%H410><s%> he will not <S%H3808><s%> forsake <S%H7503><s%> thee, neither <S%H3808><s%> destroy <S%H7843><s%> thee, nor <S%H3808><s%> forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H853><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of thy fathers <S%H1><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he swore <S%H7650><s%> unto them.

For <S%H3588><s%> ask <S%H7592><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> of the days <S%H3117><s%> that are past, <S%H7223><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, since <S%H4480><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> man <S%H120><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and ask from the one side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7097><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the other, <S%H7097><s%> <S%H8064><s%> whether there hath been <S%H1961><s%> any such thing as this <S%H2088><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> is, or <S%H176><s%> hath been heard <S%H8085><s%> like it? <S%H3644><s%>

Did ever people <S%H5971><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the fire, <S%H784><s%> as <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> hast heard, <S%H8085><s%> and live? <S%H2421><s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> hath God <S%H430><s%> attempted <S%H5254><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> him a nation <S%H1471><s%> from the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> of another nation, <S%H1471><s%> by temptations, <S%H4531><s%> by signs, <S%H226><s%> and by wonders, <S%H4159><s%> and by war, <S%H4421><s%> and by a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and by a stretched out <S%H5186><s%> arm, <S%H2220><s%> and by great <S%H1419><s%> terrors, <S%H4172><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> for you in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> before your eyes? <S%H5869><s%>

Unto thee <S%H859><s%> it was showed, <S%H7200><s%> that thou mightest know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is God; <S%H430><s%> there is none <S%H369><s%> else <S%H5750><s%> beside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> him.

Out of <S%H4480><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> he made thee to hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> that he might instruct <S%H3256><s%> thee: and upon <S%H5921><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> he showed <S%H7200><s%> thee <S%H853><s%> his great <S%H1419><s%> fire; <S%H784><s%> and thou heardest <S%H8085><s%> his words <S%H1697><s%> out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the fire. <S%H784><s%>

And because <S%H8478><s%> <S%H3588><s%> he loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy fathers, <S%H1><s%> therefore he chose <S%H977><s%> their seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them, and brought thee out <S%H3318><s%> in his sight <S%H6440><s%> with his mighty <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H3581><s%> out of Egypt; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%>

To drive out <S%H3423><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee greater <S%H1419><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> thou art, to bring thee in, <S%H935><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H853><s%> their land <S%H776><s%> for an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> as it is this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore this day, <S%H3117><s%> and consider <S%H7725><s%> it in <S%H413><s%> thine heart, <S%H3824><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is God <S%H430><s%> in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> beneath: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> there is none <S%H369><s%> else. <S%H5750><s%>

Thou shalt keep <S%H8104><s%> therefore <S%H853><s%> his statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and his commandments, <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day, <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H834><s%> it may go well <S%H3190><s%> with thee, and with thy children <S%H1121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> thee, and that <S%H4616><s%> thou mayest prolong <S%H748><s%> thy days <S%H3117><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee, forever. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>
